title: Former MAFS star Davina Rankin shares a snap of her nursery and baby bump
text:
Married At First Sight's Davina Rankin is due to give birth to her first child in just four weeks time.

And on Saturday, the 28-year-old shared a photo of her adorable nursery - and her massive bump.

The soon-to-be mother posed in a white bra top and matching shorts, her bump on glorious display.

'This room will soon be occupied by a little princess!' Former MAFS star Davina Rankin (pictured) shared a snap of her nursery and showed off her massive bump in an Instagram snap on Saturday

She was posing in the new nursery, which is decorated in muted tones and pastel shades.

What looked like a bamboo baby bassinet stands in the room, and a cactus motif was featured on the wall in the form of decals.

Books, soft toys and a rainbow painting completed the cosy decor, and a white rug with black spots sat on the wooden floorboards.

Davina captioned the photo: 'I can't believe this room will soon be occupied by a little princess. What will her little face look like? Will she know who I am?'

Davina captioned the photo: 'I can't believe this room will soon be occupied by a little princess. What will her little face look like? Will she know who I am?'

She said of her dog: 'Will Dorito Paws feel left out?' before adding: 'What foods will she be allergic too? Will she want to do dancing or karate? My little mind is just constantly ticking over about her.'

The former reality star added: 'Totally ready for her to just get here now so we can all start doing life as a family.'

Fancy! Last week, the star celebrated the upcoming arrival of her daughter with a very glamorous baby shower with friends at Paw Paw Cafe in East Brisbane

Cute! Taking to her Instagram page, she shared a series of snaps from the lunch. 'I am so overwhelmed to be honest I really didn't want a baby shower, but I'm so glad my beautiful best friend @gillzy_ convinced me!' she captioned the post

Last week, the star celebrated the upcoming arrival of her daughter with a very glamorous baby shower with friends at Paw Paw Cafe in East Brisbane.

Taking to her Instagram page, she shared a series of snaps from the lunch.

'I am so overwhelmed to be honest I really didn't want a baby shower, but I'm so glad my beautiful best friend @gillzy_ convinced me!' she captioned the post.

It's the first child for the former reality star and her fiance, Jaxon Manuel.
description: Married At First Sight's Davina Rankin is due to give birth to her first child in just four weeks time.
authors: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
